original_title: The Untold Story: Vizconde Massacre II - May the Lord Be with Us!
overview: Follow-up to the previous year's sensationalist hit The Vizconde Massacre: God, Help Us! (based on a real, gruesome, then-unsolved triple murder that was hogging Filipino newspaper space at the time), this includes new evidence in the case.
title: The Untold Story: Vizconde Massacre II - May the Lord Be with Us!
